title: "/minigames"
---

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to do various minigames.

## /minigames barb_assault start

**Usage**

- `/minigames barb_assault start`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /minigames barb_assault buy

**Usage**

- `/minigames barb_assault buy name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The item to buy. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | Quantity. | - |

## /minigames barb_assault level

**Usage**

- `/minigames barb_assault level`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /minigames barb_assault gamble

**Usage**

- `/minigames barb_assault gamble tier:<string> quantity:<integer>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tier` | `string` | Yes | What tier of gamble to do. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | Yes | The amount of gambles to do. | - |

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `names` | `string` | No | Names. e.g. Magnaboy, Kyra, Alex | - |

## /minigames pest_control xp

**Usage**

- `/minigames pest_control xp skill:<string> amount:<integer>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | The skill to put XP in. | - |
| `amount` | `integer` | Yes | The amount of points you want to spend. | - |

**Usage**

- `/minigames pest_control buy name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The skill you want XP in. | - |

## /minigames temple_trek start

**Usage**

- `/minigames temple_trek start difficulty:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `difficulty` | `string` | Yes | The difficulty of the trek. | Easy, Medium, Hard |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | Amount of treks. | - |

## /minigames temple_trek buy

**Usage**

- `/minigames temple_trek buy reward:<string> difficulty:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `reward` | `string` | Yes | The reward to purchase. | - |
| `difficulty` | `string` | Yes | The difficulty of token to use | Easy, Medium, Hard |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | Quantity | - |

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
